text: Teresa Ellen Gorman (née Moore; 30 September 1931 – 28 August 2015) was a British politician. She was born in Putney, London. She was Conservative Member of Parliament for Billericay, in the county of Essex in England, from 1987 until 2001, when she stood down.Former Billericay MP Teresa Gorman dies aged 83 ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Conservative Party (UK) MPs Category:Members of the British House of Commons for English constituencies Category:Politicians from London
title: Teresa Gorman
